original_text: Then, while I looked, I saw a fourth animal in my vision. It was a terrible animal that was very strong. It had large iron teeth. It ate things and it broke them into pieces. It used its feet to stamp on everything else. It was different from the other animals. It had ten horns.
korean_text: 내가 밤 환상 가운데에 그 다음에 본 넷째 짐승은 무섭고 놀라우며 또 매우 강하며 또 쇠로 된 큰 이가 있어서 먹고 부서뜨리고 그 나머지를 발로 밟았으며 이 짐승은 전의 모든 짐승과 다르고 또 열 뿔이 있더라

sentences.original_text: I saw a fourth animal in my vision
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 환상에서 네 번째 짐승을 보았습니다
그것은 큰 쇠 이빨을 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it broke them into pieces
It used its feet to stamp on everything else
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 발로 다른 모든 것을 짓밟았습니다

sentences.original_text: It was different from the other animals

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 열 개의 뿔을 가지고 있었습니다
